event.title: FSFE Berlin local group presentation about The Fediverse, Germany

body.p: The FSFE Berlin local group has organized a presentation about The Fediverse as an alternative to existing social media platforms. It will take place in the Cafe Wostok (Weitlingstraße 97, next to Lichtenberg station in Berlin). Tobias from the local group is part of the Friendica development community and will give an introductory lecure, no prior knowledge about the Fediverse is expected. Afterwards there will be time to ask questions and make some first steps into the Fediverse.

ul.li: Where: Cafe Wostok, Weitlingstraße 97, Berlin Lichtenberg

body.p: The presentation will be in German, but questions can be asked in English as well.
